itunes:subtitle: Knowing how to prioritize ourselves and practice self care is SO important for our healing process. In this episode, Les Alfred of Balanced Black Girl joins us to talk about what this looks like for us in our daily life.    CONNECT WITH OUR...
itunes:summary:
Knowing how to prioritize ourselves and practice self care is SO important for our healing process. In this episode, Les Alfred of Balanced Black Girl joins us to talk about what this looks like for us in our daily life. 

 

CONNECT WITH OUR GUEST
Les's IG: @balancedles
Balanced Black Girl IG: @balancedblackgirlhealpodcast
Balanced Black Girl Website: BalancedBlackGirl.com

 

RESOURCES MENTIONED

  • The Healed and Loved Woman Membership
  • Join our weekly text inspiration list by texting PODCAST to 832-219-7815
  • Get our free download - The 5 Step Roadmap to Heal Love Addiction
  • Apply to work together in the Recovery School  - Click here to pre-apply!
  • Learn that YOU ARE WORTHY  - Enroll in You Are Worthy here


CONNECT WITH US ELSEWHERE
Instagram: @BlackGirlsHeal
Facebook: Black Girls Heal
Website: Blackgirlsheal.org
